snippet.title: Flower Sort Puzzle - Color Sorting Game for iOS / Android
snippet.description:
🌼 Website: https://flowers.mypuzzlegames.com/
🌼 Apple iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1617125287
🌼 Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsgears.flowers
🌼 More games: https://www.mypuzzlegames.com/

🌼 About game

Flower Sorting Puzzle is a simple logical colorful game for brain training. No time limit, just daily challenges to solve. Enjoy many levels and quizzes to solve. 

Daily Challenges

Try every day challenge and solve all puzzles for day. Share your progress with friends. Make better score!

Apple iOS, Android devices

The game is available for main mobile device platforms like Apple iOS and Google Android. Find it in your app store.

Game mode - more levels

Check also Game mode. You can play infinitive games for all levels. Neverending playing!

HOW TO PLAY
The aim of the game is to sort the flowers according to the individual colours of the corresponding columns. There are 2 empty columns. You have to sort the individual colours together (blue to blue, green to green, etc.) If you sort all the colours correctly - that means 4 flowers of the same colour in one column, the game ends and you get final score.

Daily Challenges

Every day you get 9 new puzzles to solve. One game for each level. Say the daily challenge and tell the others.

Game difficulty

There are 9 variations of the game. Level 6-14 according to the number of colours you have to sort.

Social networks

You can share your success in the game with others on social media. Show off your score!

Game mode

There is also a GAME MODE where you can play as many games as you want for each level.

Statistics

Keep track of your game stats. Your score for the day, number of moves for each game and other data.

Problem with the solution?

Having trouble solving the puzzle? Share the game with friends or write to us.

APPLE IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1617125287
ANDROID: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsgears.flowers
WEBSITE: https://flowers.mypuzzlegames.com/

#puzzle #sorting #android #ios #game
